description:
Evans was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] captain.
He participated in and acted as spokesperson for the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council]`s coup d`Ã©tat against the Alliance government. Following the Council`s realization that the coup had been instigated by http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] to distract the Alliance government, and the subsequent death of http://anidb.net/ch750 [Dwight Greenhill], Evans announced the Council`s surrender to http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]. He then committed suicide.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Evans
